item.title: 中国企业创纪录发行 140 亿美元可转债，市场重现活力
item.description: 今年迄今为止，中国的顶级公司已创纪录地筹集了 140 亿美元的离岸可转换债券，以在利率居高不下的情况下分散未来的资金需求。【原文：China's top companies have raised a record $14 billion in offshore convertible bonds so far this year as they diversify future funding needs while interest rates stay high.】

item.title: 早间竞购：特斯拉和 Alphabet 财报成为焦点
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 数据中心公司 Equinix 进军菲律宾，着眼于东南亚地区
item.description: 全球数据中心公司 Equinix 周二表示，已从 Total Information Management 收购了菲律宾的三个数据中心，以扩大其在东南亚这一高增长潜力地区的业务。【原文：Equinix has acquired three data centers in the Philippines from Total Information Management to expand its presence in the high growth potential region of Southeast Asia, the global data center firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 上半年中国城镇新增就业 698 万人
item.description: 中国人力资源部周二表示，今年上半年新增城镇就业 698 万人。【原文：China said on Tuesday that it added 6.98 million urban new jobs in the first half of the year, according to the human resources ministry.】

item.title: 备忘录称，网络安全公司 Wiz 放弃与谷歌达成的 230 亿美元交易
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份 Wiz 备忘录，网络安全初创公司 Wiz 放弃了谷歌母公司 Alphabet 230 亿美元的收购交易，并选择按最初计划进行首次公开募股。【原文：Cybersecurity startup Wiz has walked away from a reported $23 billion deal to be acquired by Google-parent Alphabet and has chosen to pursue an initial public offering as it initially planned, according to a Wiz memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 菲律宾将开始结束境外博彩中心的运营
item.description: 菲律宾博彩业监管机构周二表示，将吊销境外博彩公司的执照，并与执法机构合作执行小费迪南德-马科斯总统关于全面禁止博彩业的命令。【原文：The Philippines' gaming regulator said on Tuesday it will cancel the licenses of offshore gambling firms and work with law enforcement agencies to implement President Ferdinand Marcos Jr's order of a total ban on the industry.】

item.title: 国媒称中国调整贷款抵押将缓解 "资产荒
item.description: 中国国家媒体周二援引消息人士的话报道称，中国央行降低中期贷款抵押品要求的决定将缓解债券市场的 "资产饥荒 "压力。【原文：China's central bank's decision to lower the collateral requirement for medium-term loans will alleviate the "asset famine" pressure on the bond market, state media reported on Tuesday, citing a source.】

item.title: 尽管中美关系日趋紧张，制药巨头仍盯上中国交易
item.description: 业内高管和投资银行家表示，一些全球最大的制药商并没有被日益加剧的中美紧张局势所吓倒，它们正在中国寻求交易，以补充药品管线，并提升其在全球第二大医药市场的影响力。【原文：Some of the biggest global drugmakers, undeterred by mounting Sino-U.S. tensions, are scouring for deals in China to replenish drug pipelines and boost their presence in the world's second-biggest pharmaceutical market, industry executives and investment bankers said.】

item.title: 芯片股反弹，亚洲股市结束连跌走势
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市从一个月的低点反弹，台湾股市结束了连续五天的跌势，原因是半导体股从华尔街的复苏中率先反弹，而大宗商品价格下挫则拖累了澳元。【原文：Asian stocks bounced from one-month lows on Tuesday, with Taiwan's market snapping a five-day losing streak as semiconductor shares took a lead from a Wall Street recovery, while sagging commodity prices weighed on the Aussie dollar.】

item.title: 韩国第二季度经济增长可能大幅放缓
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，在经历了一年多的温和扩张之后，韩国上一季度的经济增长可能放缓至接近停滞，原因是尽管出口强劲，但借贷成本上升抑制了国内需求。【原文：After more than a year of moderate expansion, South Korea's economic growth likely slowed to a near halt last quarter as higher borrowing costs held back domestic demand despite robust exports, a Reuters poll of economists found.】

item.title: 澳元、新西兰元因中国降息而挣扎；美元漂泊不定
item.description: 周二，澳元和新西兰元在中国下调几项关键利率后在数周低点附近徘徊，美元则变化不大，等待新的推动力。【原文：The Australian and New Zealand dollars languished near multi-week lows on Tuesday after China's move to cut several key interest rates, while the dollar was little changed as it awaited fresh impetus.】

item.title: 预测原油库存膨胀、需求疲软，油价下跌
item.description: 周二，油价连续第三个交易日下滑，原因是投资者关注石油供应膨胀和需求疲软的前景，同时对美国总统竞选活动的动荡反应甚微。【原文：Oil prices slipped for a third trading session on Tuesday as investors focused on the prospect of swelling oil supplies and weak demand, while showing little reaction to U.S. presidential campaign upheaval.】

item.title: 美国奥委会就商标问题起诉洛根-保罗的饮料公司
item.description: 美国奥林匹克和残疾人奥林匹克委员会起诉了由 YouTube 名人洛根-保罗和 KSI 创办的运动饮料制造商 Prime Hydration，指控该公司以美国篮球队球员凯文-杜兰特为主角的奥运主题广告侵犯了其商标权。【原文：The U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Committee has sued sports drink maker Prime Hydration, founded by YouTube personalities Logan Paul and KSI, for allegedly violating its trademark rights with an Olympic-themed ad campaign featuring Team USA basketball player Kevin Durant.】

item.title: 保时捷调整财年展望，警告合金供应短缺将导致减值
item.description: 保时捷周二将其今年的销售预期下调至 390 亿至 400 亿欧元（约合 435.6 亿美元），并警告说，由于铝合金供应短缺影响了多家供应商，生产将出现减值。【原文：Porsche on Tuesday lowered its sales forecast for the year to between 39 billion and 40 billion euros ($43.56 billion) and warned of impairments in production spurred by a supply shortage of aluminium alloys impacting various suppliers.】

item.title: 谷歌取消从 Chrome 浏览器中移除 Cookie 的计划
item.description: 谷歌周一表示，它计划在其 Chrome 浏览器中保留第三方 Cookie，在此之前，谷歌曾多年承诺逐步淘汰这种用于在互联网上跟踪用户的微小代码包。【原文：Google is planning to keep third-party cookies in its Chrome browser, it said on Monday, after years of pledging to phase out the tiny packets of code meant to track users on the internet.】

item.title: 纽约商业银行完成向摩根大通出售约 60 亿美元抵押仓储贷款的交易
item.description: 地区性贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周一表示，已完成向华尔街巨头摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）出售约 59 亿美元的抵押仓库贷款。【原文：Regional lender New York Community Bancorp said on Monday it had closed the sale of about $5.9 billion in mortgage warehouse loans to Wall Street giant JPMorgan Chase .】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司第四季度收入下降 13.3
item.description: 本周二，Lynas 稀土公司公布第四季度收入下降 13.3%，原因是中国产量的增加给价格带来了更大压力。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths posted a 13.3% drop in fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday as higher Chinese production piled more pressure on prices.】

item.title: 拜登出局，大选战火重燃，亚洲股市反弹
item.description: Alden Bentley 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets by Alden Bentley.】

item.title: 芯片设计软件公司 Cadence 预测第三季度业绩低于预期
item.description: 芯片设计软件制造商 Cadence Design Systems 周一预测第三季度收入和利润低于华尔街预期，表明竞争对手 Synopsys .【原文：Chip design software maker Cadence Design Systems forecast third-quarter revenue and profit below Wall Street estimates on Monday, indicating stiff competition from rival Synopsys .】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会批准首批现货以太坊 ETF 周二开始交易
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission）已通知申请推出美国首批与以太币价格挂钩的交易所交易基金（ETF）的八家公司中的至少两家，它们的产品可以在本周二开始交易。【原文：The U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission has told at least two of the eight firms that have applied to launch the first U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the price of ether that their products can begin trading on Tuesday.】

item.title: 除亚洲和欧洲外，所有地区的商务旅行支出均有所恢复
item.description: 据一家行业协会周一发布的报告称，随着企业恢复亲身聚会和会议，2023 年北美、拉丁美洲、中东和非洲的全球商务旅行支出将恢复到大流行前的水平。【原文：Global business travel spending in 2023 recovered to pre-pandemic levels in North America, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa as companies resumed in-person gatherings and conferences, according to report released Monday by an industry association.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下 TNT 体育公司竞标 NBA 转播权
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下的体育网络 TNT 体育公司正在重新竞标美国国家篮球协会比赛的转播权，该公司周一表示，已与其中一家竞争转播商的报价相匹配，并可能获得比赛转播权。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's sports network TNT Sports, which is re-bidding for the broadcast rights for National Basketball Association games, said on Monday it had matched an offer from one of the competing broadcasters and may secure the rights to broadcast the games.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，美国众议院小组要求 CrowdStrike 首席执行官就中断事件作证
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周一援引国会小组的一封信报道，美国众议院国土安全委员会要求 CrowdStrike 首席执行官乔治-库尔茨（George Kurtz）就最近发生的大规模全球故障作证。【原文：U.S. House of Representatives Homeland Security Committee has called on CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz to testify about a recent massive global outage, the Washington Post reported on Monday, citing a letter by the congressional panel.】

item.title: 连锁影院 AMC 达成新的再融资协议
item.description: AMC Entertainment Holdings 周一表示，该公司已与债权人达成协议，将高达 24.5 亿美元的债务期限从 2026 年延长至 2029 年及以后。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings said on Monday it had reached an agreement with creditors that extends up to $2.45 billion of debt maturities from 2026 to 2029 and beyond.】

item.title: 惠誉称：CrowdStrike 中断对保险公司的打击有限
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）表示，CrowdStrike公司的安全软件更新故障导致上周全球互联网服务中断，全球保险和再保险业很可能不会因此受到重大财务影响。【原文：The global insurance and reinsurance industry is likely to avoid any major financial impact from the outage sparked by CrowdStrike's glitchy security software update that disrupted internet services worldwide last week, Fitch Ratings said.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司正式向奥地利和荷兰出售 C-390；2027 年开始交付
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周一签署合同，正式向荷兰和奥地利出售 9 架 C-390 千禧型军用飞机，进一步扩大了其国防订单积压。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Monday signed the contract to formalize the sale of nine C-390 Millennium military aircraft to the Netherlands and Austria, further expanding its defense order backlog.】

item.title: 美国电话电报公司（AT&T）称，2 月份的无线故障阻断了 9200 多万次通话
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会在路透社看到的一份报告中说，2 月份 AT&T 公司全国范围的无线中断持续了 12 个多小时，阻断了 9200 多万次语音通话，阻止了 25000 多次拨打 911 的尝试。【原文：A nationwide AT&T wireless outage in February that lasted for more than 12 hours blocked more than 92 million voice calls and prevented more than 25,000 attempts to reach 911, the U.S. Federal Communications Commission said in a report seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 保时捷淡化电动车雄心，称过渡需要 "数年时间
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商保时捷周一表示，预计向电动汽车过渡所需的时间将比想象的要长，该公司此前曾表示，其目标是到 2030 年实现 80% 的销量为纯电动汽车。【原文：Luxury carmaker Porsche expects the transition to electric vehicles to take longer than it thought, it said on Monday, having previously said its aim was for 80% of sales to be all-electric by 2030.】

item.title: 巴克莱试图削减英国投资者 7.2 亿美元的 "黑池 "诉讼费
item.description: 巴克莱银行周一要求伦敦高等法院将一项价值高达 5.6 亿英镑（约合 7.2 亿美元）的股东诉讼减半以上，该诉讼指控这家英国银行在其私人 "黑池 "交易平台方面误导市场。【原文：Barclays on Monday asked London's High Court to more than halve a shareholders' lawsuit worth up to 560 million pounds ($720 million) accusing the British bank of misleading the market about its private "dark pool" trading platforms.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，收购公司 L Catterton 向美泰提出收购要约
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周一表示，奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）支持的私募股权公司 L Catterton 已向美国玩具制造商美泰提出收购要约。【原文：L Catterton, the private equity firm backed by luxury goods giant LVMH , has approached U.S. toy maker Mattel with an acquisition offer, people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】
